title: Introductory Chemistry
description: Introductory course in chemistry. Measurement, metric system, properties of matter, chemical symbols, atomic structure, chemical formulas, nomenclature, chemical equations, the mole concept, stoichiometry. 3 lectures. Not open to students majoring in Chemistry or Biochemistry. Not open to students with credit for CHEM 110, CHEM 111, CHEM 124, or CHEM 127.
prerequisites: Passing score on ELM examination, or an ELM exemption, or MATH 104
